bibl.idno: The Philip S. Hench Walter Reed/Yellow Fever Collection [manuscript] / [collected by] Philip S. Hench ; HEALTHSCI MS-1.

bibl.title: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to the Microfilm Service, Army Medical Library, January 16, 1941

div1.p: Hench requests microfilms and photostats from the Army Medical Library pertaining to the yellow fever investigation.

div1.head: Letter from Philip Showalter Hench to the Microfilm Service, Army Medical Library, January 16, 1941
div1.opener:
Microfilms 7.20
Photostats 7.00
Total = 14.20
MAYO CLINIC
ROCHESTER, MINNESOTA
January 16, 1941
DR. PHILIP S. HENCH
DR. CHARLES H. SLOCUMB
Medicofilm Service
Army Medical Library
Washington, D. C.
1-26-7
Gentlemen:
div1.p:
Enclosed please find my signed check (you can fill in the proper
amount) for which please send me medicofilm of all of the following references.
In addition I want photoprints of the material starred *.

list.item:
1. Book 1. Proc. Third Pan-American Medical Congress, Havana, Cuba,
Feb. 1901. (Tercer Congress Medico Pan-Americano).
Tome 1. Page 45 - Address of the Military Gov. of Cuba, Dr. Wood.
Pages 195-211 (inclusive) - Paper by Carlos Finlay.
Pages 287-291 (incl.) Discussion of Reed's paper.
* · Pages 292-301 English version paper by Reed, Carroll, Agramonte.
* · Pages 302-322 Spanish " " " " " "
Pages 323-325 Discussion (Sesion de la tarde: Feb. 5, 1901).
Page 328 (one page only) Title page - paper by Duenas.
Page 357 " " " " " " " Tremols.
Page 363-365 (incl.) Paper by Plummer.
Page 366 (Title page only) - Paper by Edelmann.
Page 370 (" " ") - " " Hava
Page 405 (" " ") - " " Garganta
Borrow
from
M. J. C. Bay

2. Book 2. Public Health Papers and Reports Vol. XXVI, presented at the
twenty-eighth annual meeting of the American Public Health Association, Indianapolis,
Ind. Oct. 22, 23, 24, 25, 26, 1900. (Printed at Columbus, Ohio, The Berlin Printing
Co., 1901).
30¢-Pages 28-33 (incl.) Report of Committee on Etiology of
yellow fever (Hodrlbeck). Horlbeck Film
10¢-Pages 34-36 (incl.) Paper by Liceaga. Film
20¢* ·-Pages 37-53 (incl.) Paper by Reed, Carroll, Agramonte and Lazear.
cytyl y f
Reading notes
Film
10¢-Page 239 (one page only) Official Report of the Proceedings. Film
10¢-Page 253-255 (incl.) Film
Photostats $1.70

3. Book 3. Public Health Papers and Reports. Vol. XXVII, presented at the
twenty-ninth annual meeting of the American Public Health Assoc., Buffalo, N. Y.,
Sept. 16-20, 1901 (Printed at Columbus, Ohio; the Berlin Printing Co., 1902).
30¢ Pages 1-3 (incl.) First 3 pages of President's address Film
20¢* · Pages 113-129 (incl.) Paper by Reed and Carroll. Film (Prev of y f
10¢ Pages 130-133 (incl.) Paper by Gorgas. Film
10¢ Pages 134-143 (incl.) Paper by Doty. Film
10¢ Pages 144-151 (incl.) Paper by Bell. Film
10¢ Pages 152-156 (incl.) Paper by Liceaga. Film
10¢ Page 319 (one page only). Title page: Official Report of the
Proceedings. Film
20¢* · Pages 347-357 (incl.) Discussions. Film
10¢ Pages 363-367 (incl.) Discussions. Film
Photostats $1.70
Film
Photostats $1.10

4. Book 4. Public Health Papers and Reports, Vol. XXIX, presented at the
thirty-first annual meeting of the American Public Health Association, Washington,
D. C., October 26-30, 1903 (Printed at Columbus, Ohio, Press of Fred J. Heer, 1904).
30¢ Pages 39-42 Paper by Ross.
10¢ Pages 47-49 Paper by Guiteras.
20¢ Pages 50-64 Paper by Carter.
10¢ Pages 65-67 Paper by Gorgas.
10¢ Pages 68-70 Paper by Finlay.
10¢ Pages 71-76 Paper by Howard.
10¢ Pages 81-90 Paper by Lindsley.
10¢ Page 259 (one page only). Title Page; Official Report
of the Proceedings.
20¢ Pages 285-295 Discussions.
20¢* · Pages 406-415 Paper by Carroll. of Y F
Film
Photostats $100

5. Book 5. Public Health Papers and Reports, Vol. XXXI, Part 1.
Presented at the thirty-third annual meeting of the American Public Health Association,
Boston, Mass., Sept. 25-29, 1905 (Printed at Columbus, Ohio, Press of F.J. Heer, 1906).
30¢* · Pages 272-277 Paper by Carroll. known from Y F & Governance
10¢ Pages 278-283 Paper by Guiteras.
10¢ Pages 284-288 Paper by Liceaga.
10¢ Page 373 (one page only). Title page - Official Report of
the Proceedings.
10¢* · Pages 444-446 Discussions. of Carrolls Paper
Photostats 60¢
Film
Photostats 30¢

6. *· Paper by James Carroll: “Remarks on the epidemic of yellow fever in
Baltimore.” The Hospital Bulletin, University of Maryland, Vol. 1, Feb. 15, 1906,
pp. 187-192. Film

7. Report of the Surgeon-General of the Army to the Secretary of War for
the fiscal year ending June 30, 1902. Film
30¢ Pages 55-56 Remarks on yellow fever.

8. Report of the Surgeon General of the Army to the Sec. of War for the
fiscal year ending June 30, 1903.
30¢ Pages 48-49 Remarks on yellow fever. Film

9. Report of the Surgeon General of the Army to the Sec. of War for the
fiscal year ending June 30, 1904.
30¢ Pages 61-67 Remarks on yellow fever. Film

10. Centennial year. Annual Report of the Supervising Surgeon-General
of the Marine Hospital Service of the United States for the fiscal year 1898.
Articles on yellow fever pages 207-454 inclusive.

$1.70
About 400 +
pages in all for medicofilm
about 100 pages photoprint

div1.closer:
Sincerely, P. S. Hench, M. D. I enclose a carbon copy of this order as the order for the photoprints may
have to go to a different department from that for the medicofilm.
